doc:
Charles Esten https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Esten 0 Charles Esten Puskar III (born September 9, 1965), known professionally as Chip Esten and Charles Esten, is an American actor, singer and comedian. Esten is best known for his role as country singer Deacon Claybourne on the American Broadcasting Company/CMT (U.S. TV channel) drama Nashville, which he played from 2012 to 2018. He previously appeared on the improvisation show Whose Line Is It Anyway? regularly between 1999–2005. Charles_Esten_Puskar_III ( born September_9_,_1965 ) , known professionally as Chip_Esten_and_Charles_Esten , is an_American_actor , singer_and_comedian . Esten is_best_known for his_role as country_singer_Deacon_Claybourne on the_American_Broadcasting_Company/CMT ( U.S._TV_channel_)_drama_Nashville , which he played from 2012 to 2018 . He previously appeared on the_improvisation_show Whose_Line Is It Anyway ? regularly between 1999 – 2005 .
